member.summary: Pauses the clock on the current time.

member.summary: Pauses the clock on the specified time.
member.param: The dateTime at which we want to pause..
member.returns: An IDisposable object that will resume the clock on dispose.

member.name: P:System.Clock.IsPaused
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is paused.

member.name: P:System.Clock.Now
member.summary: Gets a DateTime representing the current date and time. The resolution of the returned value depends on the system timer. For Windows NT 3.5 and later the timer resolution is approximately 10ms, for Windows NT 3.1 it is approximately 16ms, and for Windows 95 and 98 it is approximately 55ms.

member.name: P:System.Clock.UtcNow
member.summary: Gets a DateTime representing the current date and time in UTC format. The resolution of the returned value depends on the system timer. For Windows NT 3.5 and later the timer resolution is approximately 10ms, for Windows NT 3.1 it is approximately 16ms, and for Windows 95 and 98 it is approximately 55ms.

member.name: P:System.Clock.Transform
member.summary: Gets or sets a function that will be applied to all returned DateTime values.
